name: Garlic Mashed Potato Casserole
author: Chef Kris
summary: A great make-ahead recipe, and a nice amount of extra flavor instead of your standard mashed.
ingredients: 3 pounds Yukon Gold potatoes, or more as needed
½ cup chopped green onions, divided
3 cloves garlic, crushed and chopped, or to taste
directions: Place potatoes into a large pot and cover with salted water; bring to a boil
Reduce heat to medium-low and simmer until tender, about 20 minutes
Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
Combine milk, cream cheese, 1/3 cup green onions, egg, butter, garlic, and salt in a bowl
Mash together until mixture is smooth
Spoon into the prepared baking dish
Sprinkle with Cheddar cheese and remaining green onions
Bake in the preheated oven until lightly browned, about 40 minutes
